attributes.review: The second I opened it I got really scared of the bagel orange man on the screen made me poop my pants and gave my dog a stroke
attributes.title: It’s just bad

attributes.review: i downloaded this app so that i could bow down to the lord mr.orange but right when i opened the app my eyes starting bleeding👁💧👄👁.  it was horrific.  then mr.orange starting talking and my ears starting bleeding 🧚🏼‍♀️💫. i had to delete the app right away and right when i did naked pics of him where on my home and lock screen 😰😭.  the pics made my pet rat jump on my phone screen and start scratching the screen until mr.orange was gone aka until my phone broke 😭😭. thank you for reading🤩💅🏿💅🏻. luv you babygorl🧚🏼‍♀️💫😽
attributes.title: horrible app❤️😰🧚🏻‍♀️💫

attributes.review: it’s useless and all you see is this guy named donald dumbass
attributes.title: VERY BAD APP

attributes.review: The opening page of the app Waze a whole bunch of space with what I’m assuming is a background photo. While the text reads OK with voiceover android users who need accessibility will be without. Background photo, when a large with zoom is highly reminiscent of Nazi Germany photos taken of Hitler. The News does not cite credible sources, and Trax its users through the phone number and location. This app is a privacy concern.
attributes.title: App unusable

attributes.review: I immediately open the app and everything is red white and blue🤮 (the worst possible color combination). I look in the background and see and orange pig. 😂It looked like he had a really thin blond toupee. I am mortified. Then it told me to put my phone number in🙅🏽‍♀️. 👁👄👁 why would I want to do that. But I did. Then I got a text from this orange pig app. I had to put in a code. After that it asked for MORE personal information???????😟 THE GOVERNMENT COULD TRACK ME~even though they already do. I don’t want that👎🏽. The worst part? It said “ An Orange Pig 2020” 😱AHHHHHHHHHHH😱
attributes.title: An orange pig???

attributes.review: This app,When I put my phone number in he or someone hooked it up to my moms phone and woke my mom up.Next i looked st the pictures and there he was naked with his nudes released.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: So I opened the app and I saw a roach so I got scared. Then I thought to myself “roaches aren’t orange” so I opened the app again and it asked for my number. I put in “666-666-6666” and waited for the code to be texted to me. Then the orange roach jumped out of the phone and landed on me. It started talking. “Make America great again.” So I hit it with my textbook about America history and burned the book. Then I blasted FTD and went to bed. ❤️
attributes.title: Um. No❤️

attributes.review: i opened the app and my phone immediately starting spazzing out and the little einsteins theme song started blazing on repeat with aggressive base and my camera took hundreds of unflattering selfies WITH THE FLASH ON so yea unless u want your confidence to go down by 10000x don’t get the app just get tiktok instead
attributes.title: don’t do it
